definition: Baden or Biden (name)/Joe Biden (1942-), US democrat politician, senator for Delaware from 1972, several times chair of Senate foreign relations committee, vice-president of USA from 2009

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Biden said it would be good for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 拜登稱高鐵網絡將有利於經濟發展。

sentences.english: Biden's biography, he told the crowd, and, after meeting him, declared: 'I think the book is much better.
sentences.chinese: 在與拜登會面後，他告訴衆人說，我覺得書要好得多。

sentences.english: China welcomed Vice President Biden for a visit in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 中方歡迎拜登副總統於二0一一年訪華。

sentences.english: Obama and Biden will arrive in Washington, via train, on January 17.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬和拜登將於1月17日乘火車抵達華盛頓。

sentences.english: He told the paper the Bidens never met or communicated with Stanford.
sentences.chinese: 他說，拜登家族從未與斯坦福見過面或溝通過。

sentences.english: Mackay said he had not discussed the matter with Biden.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱稱，他與拜登尚未就此事進行討論。

sentences.english: Biden filed a separate non-resident tax return for the state of Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 拜登博士還單獨上報了一份維珍尼亞州非居住居民稅。

sentences.english: If elected, Biden would be the first Catholic vice president.
sentences.chinese: 如果當選，拜登將成爲首位天主教徒副總統。

sentences.english: Biden also addressed the stigma of speech impediments.
sentences.chinese: 拜登還談到了言語障礙造成的羞辱感。

sentences.english: Then the little boy turned to Joe Biden and said, "I know why people hate you."
sentences.chinese: 然後小孩又轉向拜登，我知道爲啥人們都恨你。

sentences.english: In order to raise more funds before, Biden also spared no effort.
sentences.chinese: 爲了在此之前籌集到更多資金，拜登也不遺餘力。

sentences.english: US Vice President Joe Biden started his visit to China today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，美國副總統拜登將開始對中國的訪問。

sentences.english: Mr. Biden visited Japan at the end of a trip to Asia.
sentences.chinese: 拜登先生亞洲之旅的最後訪問了日本。

sentences.english: Biden remarried in 1977, a union that produced a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 拜登於1977年再婚，育有一女。

sentences.english: After finishing the eulogy, the president wrapped Biden in a warm hug.
sentences.chinese: 在唸完悼詞後，奧巴馬給了拜登一個溫暖的擁抱。

sentences.english: One day after holding his first campaign event with running mate Joe Biden, Democrat Barack Obama was stumping in Wisconsin.
sentences.chinese: 拜登一起出席競選活動後的第一天，民主黨的巴拉克。

definition: Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
Sanders (name)/Bernie Sanders, United States Senator from Vermont and 2016 Presidential candidate
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician

definition: Mike Pence (1959-), US Republican politician, US vice president from 2017
Bush (name)/George H.W. Bush (1924-2018), US president 1988-1992/George W. Bush (1946-), US President 2000-2008
Taiwanese variant of 奧巴馬|奥巴马[Ao4 ba1 ma3], Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
